mapper.insert: insert into greetings (type, name, greet, send_time) values (#{type},#{name},#{greet},#{sendTime})
mapper.update: update greetings set type=#{type},name=#{name},greet=#{greet},send_time=#{sendTime},updated_time= now() where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from greetings where id in #{item}
